sopsPolicies.title: SOPs & Policies
sopsPolicies.subtitle: Create, assign, and manage Standard Operating Procedures and Policies that ensure compliance and clarity across your organization.
sopsPolicies.overviewText: Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and Policies are the backbone of consistent operations and regulatory compliance. Naranja makes it effortless to create, distribute, and track these critical documents across every role in your organization.
sopsPolicies.roleBasedDesc: Automatically assign SOPs and policies to specific roles, departments, or locations ensuring everyone has access to the documentation they need.
sopsPolicies.completionTrackingDesc: Monitor who has read and acknowledged each document with real-time compliance tracking and automated reminders for overdue reviews.
sopsPolicies.versionControlDesc: Maintain complete audit history with automatic versioning. Every change is tracked, timestamped, and archived for regulatory compliance.
sopsPolicies.complianceReportingDesc: Generate comprehensive reports showing completion rates, outstanding acknowledgments, and audit-ready documentation at any time.
sopsPolicies.visualWorkflowsDesc: Create step-by-step visual guides with embedded photos and videos to make procedures clearer and easier to follow.
sopsPolicies.automatedNotificationsDesc: Keep your team informed with automatic alerts for new documents, policy updates, and upcoming review deadlines.
sopsPolicies.benefitsHeading: Why Choose Naranja for SOPs & Policies
sopsPolicies.productionFloorDesc: Manufacturing procedures, equipment operation guides, safety protocols, and quality control checklists.
sopsPolicies.foodSafetyDesc: HACCP procedures, allergen management, cleaning schedules, and hygiene protocols.
sopsPolicies.qualityAssuranceDesc: Testing procedures, inspection protocols, non-conformance handling, and corrective actions.
sopsPolicies.hrAdminDesc: Employee handbooks, onboarding procedures, leave policies, and workplace conduct guidelines.
sopsPolicies.ctaText: Transform how your organization manages SOPs and policies. Get audit-ready in minutes, not hours.

turkus.title: Turkus Document Management
turkus.subtitle: Your central hub for managing controlled documents with version control, role-based access, and complete audit trails.
turkus.overviewText: Turkus provides a powerful, intuitive platform for managing all your controlled documents. Upload, organize, version, and assign documents to users and roles, ensuring everyone always has access to the latest, compliant information.
turkus.easyUploadDesc: Drag and drop documents or upload in bulk. Support for all common file formats including PDFs, Word docs, Excel spreadsheets, and images.
turkus.smartOrganizationDesc: Organize documents by category, department, or custom tags. Create folder structures that mirror your organizational hierarchy.
turkus.roleBasedAccessDesc: Assign documents to specific users, roles, or departments with granular permission controls ensuring the right people have the right access.
turkus.versionControlDesc: Automatic version tracking with complete history. Easily compare versions, restore previous editions, and see exactly what changed and when.
turkus.auditTrailsDesc: Comprehensive audit logs track every document access, modification, and download for complete compliance and regulatory readiness.
turkus.powerfulSearchDesc: Find documents instantly with advanced search and filtering. Search by title, content, tags, author, date, or custom metadata.
turkus.qualityDocsDesc: Quality manuals, inspection procedures, non-conformance reports, and CAPA documentation.
turkus.safetyComplianceDesc: Safety data sheets, risk assessments, HACCP plans, and regulatory compliance documents.
turkus.trainingMaterialsDesc: Training guides, certification records, competency assessments, and learning resources.
turkus.operationalDocsDesc: Standard forms, checklists, maintenance schedules, and equipment manuals.
turkus.ctaHeading: Ready to Take Control of Your Documents?
turkus.ctaText: Transform document chaos into organized, compliant, and accessible information your team can trust.

managingRisks.title: Managing Risks
managingRisks.subtitle: Identify, assess, and control workplace hazards with comprehensive risk management tools that keep your team safe and operations compliant.
managingRisks.overviewText: Effective risk management is essential for workplace safety and regulatory compliance. Naranja provides powerful tools for conducting risk assessments, tracking hazards in real-time, implementing corrective actions, and maintaining complete audit trails across your organization.
managingRisks.customAssessmentsDesc: Create tailored risk assessments for specific roles, departments, equipment, and processes. Standardized templates ensure consistent evaluation across your organization.
managingRisks.integratedTrainingDesc: Link risk assessments directly to training modules ensuring employees understand hazards and control measures before starting work.
managingRisks.realTimeTrackingDesc: Report and track hazards as they occur with instant notifications to managers. Monitor corrective actions from identification through resolution.
managingRisks.managerDashboardsDesc: Comprehensive dashboards provide real-time visibility into risk levels, outstanding actions, and compliance status across departments and sites.
managingRisks.completeAuditTrailsDesc: Maintain detailed records of all risk assessments, control measures, and corrective actions with timestamped audit trails ready for inspections.
managingRisks.trendAnalysisDesc: Identify patterns and recurring risks with analytics and reporting tools. Make data-driven decisions to continuously improve safety.
managingRisks.benefitsHeading: Why Choose Naranja for Risk Management
managingRisks.operationalHazardsDesc: Equipment operation, machinery safety, moving parts, noise, vibration, and manual handling risks.
managingRisks.chemicalBiologicalDesc: Hazardous substances, cleaning chemicals, allergens, microbial contamination, and exposure controls.
managingRisks.environmentalRisksDesc: Temperature extremes, slips and trips, working at height, confined spaces, and emergency scenarios.
managingRisks.humanFactorsDesc: Fatigue, stress, lone working, new starters, contractor safety, and behavioral risks.
managingRisks.ctaHeading: Ready to Strengthen Your Risk Management?
managingRisks.ctaText: Create a safer workplace with systematic risk assessment and proactive hazard control.

instructionalMedia.title: Instructional Media & Training
instructionalMedia.subtitle: Create engaging, visual work instructions and training materials that ensure consistency, reduce errors, and accelerate learning.
instructionalMedia.overviewText: Transform complex processes into clear, step-by-step visual instructions that employees actually understand and follow. Naranja makes it easy to create, manage, and deliver engaging training content with photos, videos, and interactive elements.
instructionalMedia.visualWorkInstructionsDesc: Create step-by-step visual guides tailored to specific roles and tasks. Break down complex processes into clear, easy-to-follow instructions.
instructionalMedia.videoIntegrationDesc: Embed photos and videos directly into instructions. Show, don't just tell—make processes clearer and more engaging for your team.
instructionalMedia.knowledgeChecksDesc: Build in optional quizzes and knowledge checks to verify understanding. Track completion and ensure competency before employees begin work.
instructionalMedia.richMediaSupportDesc: Support for images, videos, diagrams, and documents. Create multimedia training experiences that cater to different learning styles.
instructionalMedia.versionControlDesc: Automatically archive and manage updates to training materials. Ensure everyone always has access to the latest version of instructions.
instructionalMedia.roleBasedAssignmentDesc: Assign training and work instructions by department, job role, or location. Ensure the right people get the right information at the right time.
instructionalMedia.fasterLearningItem1: Reduce training time by up to 60%
instructionalMedia.fasterLearningItem3: Self-paced learning at point of need
instructionalMedia.equipmentOperationDesc: Step-by-step guides for operating machinery, equipment startup/shutdown procedures, and troubleshooting.
instructionalMedia.qualityProceduresDesc: Visual inspection guides, testing procedures, sampling protocols, and quality control checklists.
instructionalMedia.safetyTrainingDesc: PPE requirements, emergency procedures, hazard identification, and safe work practices.
instructionalMedia.processInstructionsDesc: Manufacturing procedures, cleaning protocols, changeover processes, and product handling.
instructionalMedia.ctaText: Create visual work instructions that your team will actually use and understand.

aboutPage.title: About Naranja
aboutPage.subtitle: Transforming food manufacturing through intelligent training and compliance solutions that keep your team audit-ready and your operations running smoothly.
aboutPage.missionText: We believe that effective training and compliance shouldn't be a burden. Our platform makes it beautifully simple for food manufacturing teams to stay trained, compliant, and audit-ready—so you can focus on what matters most: producing quality food safely.
aboutPage.precisionDesc: We deliver training solutions with the same precision you apply to your manufacturing processes. Every detail matters when it comes to food safety and compliance.
aboutPage.effortlessDesc: Complex compliance made simple. Our intuitive platform integrates seamlessly into your existing workflows without disrupting your operations.
aboutPage.auditReadyDesc: Sleep better knowing your training records, compliance documentation, and team certifications are always organized and inspection-ready.
aboutPage.continuousDesc: Data-driven insights help you identify training gaps, track progress, and continuously improve your team's performance and compliance posture.
aboutPage.industryExpertiseDesc: Built specifically for food manufacturing, we understand your unique challenges—from HACCP protocols to allergen management and everything in between.
aboutPage.beautifulSimplicityDesc: Training software doesn't have to be ugly or complicated. Our elegant interface makes compliance management actually enjoyable for your team.
aboutPage.realTimeTrackingDesc: Monitor training progress, certification expiries, and compliance status in real-time with automated alerts and comprehensive reporting.
aboutPage.partnershipDesc: We're not just a software provider—we're your compliance partners, committed to your long-term success in the food manufacturing industry.
aboutPage.andyDesc: With deep expertise in food safety protocols and training methodologies, Andy ensures our content meets the highest industry standards while remaining accessible and engaging.
aboutPage.paulDesc: Paul brings years of operational excellence to Naranja, focusing on seamless platform delivery and ensuring our solutions integrate perfectly with your existing processes.
aboutPage.provenResultsDesc: Reduce audit preparation time by 75% and improve training completion rates across your organization.
aboutPage.quickImplementationDesc: Get up and running in weeks, not months, with our streamlined onboarding process.
aboutPage.dedicatedSupportDesc: Our team provides ongoing support to ensure your success every step of the way.
aboutPage.ctaHeading: Ready to Transform Your Training & Compliance?
aboutPage.ctaText: Join the growing number of food manufacturers who trust Naranja to keep their teams trained, compliant, and audit-ready.
